mapper.select: select m_no, m_nickname, m_uuid, m_uploadpath, m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s_uuid uuid, s_uploadpath uploadpath, s_filename filename, count_image from (select /*+index_desc(style style_pk) */ rownum rn, m.m_no m_no, m_nickname m_nickname, m.uuid m_uuid, m.uploadpath m_uploadpath, m.filename m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s.uuid s_uuid, s.uploadpath s_uploadpath, s.filename s_filename, count_image from member m inner join style s on m.m_no = s.m_no where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (1 - #{pageNum}) * #{amount};

select m_no, m_nickname, m_uuid, m_uploadpath, m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s_uuid uuid, s_uploadpath uploadpath, s_filename filename, count_image from (select /*+index_desc(style style_pk) */ rownum rn, m.m_no m_no, m_nickname m_nickname, m.uuid m_uuid, m.uploadpath m_uploadpath, m.filename m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s.uuid s_uuid, s.uploadpath s_uploadpath, s.filename s_filename, count_image from member m inner join style s on m.m_no = s.m_no where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (1 - #{pageNum}) * #{amount}

select m_no, m_nickname, m_uuid, m_uploadpath, m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, uuid, uploadpath, filename, count_image from (select rownum rn, m_no, m_nickname, m_uuid, m_uploadpath, m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s_uuid uuid, s_uploadpath uploadpath, s_filename filename, count_image from (select count_hot, m.m_no m_no, m_nickname m_nickname, m.uuid m_uuid, m.uploadpath m_uploadpath, m.filename m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s.uuid s_uuid, s.uploadpath s_uploadpath, s.filename s_filename, count_image from member m inner join (select count_hot, s.style_no, m_no, style_regdate, style_content, s.count_like, s.count_reply, uuid, uploadpath, filename, count_image from style s inner join (select nvl(reply.style_no, style_like.style_no) style_no, nvl(count_reply, 0) + nvl(count_like, 0) count_hot from (select style_no, count(*) count_reply from style_reply WHERE REGDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YY/MM/DD') group by style_no) reply full outer join (select style_no, count(*) count_like from style_like WHERE REGDATE >= TO_CHAR(SYSDATE-7,'YY/MM/DD') group by style_no) style_like on reply.style_no = style_like.style_no) count_hot on s.style_no = count_hot.style_no) s on s.m_no = m.m_no order by count_hot desc) where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount} ) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select m_no, m_nickname, m_uuid, m_uploadpath, m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s_uuid uuid, s_uploadpath uploadpath, s_filename filename, count_image from (select /*+index_desc(style style_pk) */ rownum rn, m.m_no m_no, m_nickname m_nickname, m.uuid m_uuid, m.uploadpath m_uploadpath, m.filename m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s.uuid s_uuid, s.uploadpath s_uploadpath, s.filename s_filename, count_image from member m inner join (select s.* from style s inner join (select style_no from style_tag st inner join hashtag h on st.tag_no = h.tag_no where hashtag like #{query}) t on s.style_no = t.style_no) s on m.m_no = s.m_no and rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{amount}

select m_no, m_nickname, m_uuid, m_uploadpath, m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s_uuid uuid, s_uploadpath uploadpath, s_filename filename, count_image from (select /*+index_desc(style style_pk) */ rownum rn, m.m_no m_no, m_nickname m_nickname, m.uuid m_uuid, m.uploadpath m_uploadpath, m.filename m_filename, style_no, style_regdate, style_content, count_like, count_reply, s.uuid s_uuid, s.uploadpath s_uploadpath, s.filename s_filename, count_image from (select * from member where m_no in (select m_no from follow where follower=#{m_no})) m inner join style s on m.m_no = s.m_no where rownum <= #{pageNum} * #{amount}) where rn > (1 - #{pageNum}) * #{amount}
